"View Fashion":
"Here, you can view the fashion sets that everyone has registered in the Fashion Catalog.

■Sort by Time & Date
・Displays the most recently registered or updated fashions first.
・You can register or update your fashion at any time, but it will only be reflected here once every 60 minutes.

■Sort by Like!
・Displays the fashions that have received the most \"Like!\" this month first.

■Sort by Views
・Displays the fashions that have had the most \"Views\" this month first.
